template.name: osv <= 6.0
template.value: from osv import osv from osv import fields $code$

template.name: osv >= 6.1
template.value: from openerp.osv import osv from openerp.osv import orm from openerp.osv import fields $code$

template.name: fields fields.function
template.value: '$1$': fields.function($2$, method=$3$, string='$4$', type='$5$', store=$6$,$8$ help='$7$'),$9$
